question: Which of the following are the all-time record holders for the most number of Olympic medals in tennis?
option1: Kathleen McKane Godfree and Venus Williams
option2: Kathleen McKane Godfree and Serena Williams
option4: Gigi Fernandez and Mary Joe Fernandes
answer: Kathleen McKane Godfree and Venus Williams
explanation: Kathleen McKane Godfree and Venus Williams are the all-time record holders for the most number of Olympic medals in tennis.
